text:
In the rapidly changing environment of today's technology driven manufacturing, successful producers are continuously faced with implementing manufacturing solutions to improve the overall productivity and profitability of their facilities. This may mean the acquisition of leading edge technologies, the addition of proven technologies to increase capacities and in many cases, the phasing out of valuable technologies that still have many years of useful productivity in the right facility. Whatever your individual needs, Efab has a solution for you. Efab was founded in 1998 as a subsidiary of MMR International Co. Ltd. In 2010, Efab became an independent operational unit based in Taiwan with a focus on the re-marketing of MOCVD,
Solar/PV and Flat Panel Display equipment. Our services are designed to help you manage your capital equipment assets and find the equipment you need to improve your profitability at affordable prices and without long OEM lead times. Additionally, Efab is a web based, B2B marketing tool which you can use to re-market your surplus technologies. Surplus inventories and processing tools have value. You can easily realize a return on your investment without accepting pennies on the dollar from an equipment surplus clearing house. Put capital back into your budget or, into new technologies. If you are looking to purchase equipment, we invite you to browse the current inventories of Efab. Our listings are searchable by manufacturer, keyword and industry specific categories.
If the equipment you need is not currently available on our site. We invite you to post your requirements in our "Equipment Wanted" listings. Our listings are searchable by industry specific categories. Interested in selling your surplus equipment? Let Efab help you realize a true "Market Value Return" on your surplus inventories. Surplus assets have value. It's your money. Don't throw it away. Efab provides solutions for asset management, alternative parts and services that meet or exceed the original OEM specifications and specialty products. Efab is a leading supplier of Diamond technologies and materials enabling tomorrow for you today. Please contact us to learn more about our site, our products and our services.

Environmental Concerns, Inc.

Since 1992, both private and public industry has turned to the professionals of Environmental Concerns, Inc. for balanced consulting and environmentally safe solutions for dealing with toxins. Your concerns, motivations and limitations lay the groundwork for our incredible team to define options that ensure compliance and accountability.

We offer a balanced, multi-disciplinary team of trained professionals, organized within a framework of effective project management, to provide services in a broad range of environmental industries. 

  • Building Inspections
  • Clearance Testing, 
  • Lead Dust Wipes
  • Air Monitoring
  • PLM Analysis 
  • Demolition 
  • Asbestos Testing
  • Radon Test
  • Microbial 
  • Phase 1 or ESA (Environmental Site Assessments)

Environmental Concerns, Inc. is dedicated to working alongside you to maintain balance between socioeconomic development, infrastructure expansion, and environmental protection. Though they play an important role, balance requires more than scientific expertise and engineering skills. Balance requires communication, commitment, and compromise. With over 30 years of experience, intellectual diversity and a coverage area spanning over 5 states, We strive to solve your problems, not study them. 

Our problem-solving tools are founded in science, combined with an understanding of your concerns and regulatory realities. Our goal is to provide our clients with the best possible solution to specific environmental situations while maximizing cost efficiency and simplicity. 

“Our Chicagoland rehab division never had to deal with a large scale asbestos issue. Chris, Pete & Terry helped walk me through the EPA guidelines and keep our project on budget. I highly recommend consulting with them on any project with environmental concerns.”

Matthew Parker – Chicagoland Development Projects

Welcome to Desh Energy Limited

Desh Energy Limited is a Private Limited Company in the energy sector of Bangladesh. Our vision is “To render efficient power solutions for the country and to be one of the industry leaders by 2020” with the slogan “powering development”. We are committed to help Bangladesh achieve its maximum potential in energy security. We wish to achieve our goal by expansion of the present projects, by fuel diversification and with a world class management system.

ERIKS represents real innovation. Within a wide range of engineering components, they also feature up-to-date material and application knowledge. More importantly, they think along with the customers to provide technical solutions. These solutions often result in reducing down-time, reducing the cost of purchase or in products that are less harmful to the environment and are energy efficient.

Grain Trading Company “Prometey”

Grain trading company is most important member of the Prometey group, which possesses team of merchants – managers for the purchase and sale of grains and oilseeds. The specific nature of the work of the purchasing department is cyclical and is determined by the terms of the marketing year for each crop.

The company’s continuous dialogue with grain producers is carried out by 35 traders who provide an individual approach to each supplier.

We offer our clients a full range of services in the analysis, reception, storage, refining and logistics of the crop. Thanks to many years of experience in the industry, we have professionally studied the specifics – the classification, qualitative indicators, price affecting factors for each commodity we work with.

We provide the competitive prices for the purchase of grain and oilseeds on the basis of daily thorough and comprehensive analysis of the current situation on the domestic grain market, the proposals of international grain traders, complex forecasts for the development of the industry.

Our principle of cooperation with suppliers is based on the understanding that everyone should do his own thing – a farmer should grow, a trader should buy and sell.

The technical basis for the company’s trading activities is its own warehousing – a network of grain silos in Ukraine, a fleet of grain carriers with various carrying capacity.

Due to own developed infrastructure, we cooperate with grain producers almost throughout the whole Ukraine.

The financial basis of trading activities is 99% of the company’s own funds. Due to the financial independence of Prometey, in most cases, we carry out 100% prepayment for the goods, which gives us advantagecompared to competitors on the market.

The company does not work with intermediaries; thanks to this, Prometey offers only a proven product with a quality guarantee to its customers.

The main trading office of the company is in Nikolaev. A trading office was also opened in Kirovograd in November 2015.

Home > The Factory

The Factory


We are specialists in high quality nutrition for dogs and cats. We have one of the most modern pet food factories in Latin America, which was founded 19 years ago, and is a pioneer in the Super Premium food segment in Brazil. Constant investments in technology, infrastructure, innovation and personnel guarantee the status of a cutting-edge industrial complex located in a total area of 552 thousand m2 in the city of Dourado (SP).


Packaging machines, coating systems, extruders, dosage systems, dryers, mills, among others, were imported from the best international suppliers.
Our Quality Control has a lab for physico-chemical analyses, and is a reference in methodology and equipment. It works exclusively to analyse our raw materials, products and the cleanliness control of our equipment. It takes up an area of over 300 m2 and has a team trained to do bromatological and microbiological analyses.


And from September 2016, a new factory has started operating on site, built exclusively for the production of cookies, and marking our arrival in the snack segment.

We’ve invested heavily over the past 2 years in order to develop our new factory operations. Equipment was tested and brought from several different parts of the world to satisfy the demand for the production of the unique cookies from the PremieR Cookie line, formulated exclusively by the team of veterinarians, specialized in nutrition that work at the Nutritional Development Center (Centro de Desenvolvimento Nutricional – CDN).

REVERSE LOGISTICS – Return of packaging

PremieRpet® is fully aware of its socio-environmental role, and has made collection spots available, so that the disposal of its packaging be done adequately, with no harm to the environment. Get in touch with PremieRpet Responde for more information on the location of collection spots:                    0800 55 6666 – Monday to Friday, from 8h30 to 17h30.


The cookie factory is a 7,700 m2 building, where a very high quality production process guarantees strict quality control of raw materials (PremieRpet® guarantee of excellence) and a high level of automation in the processes. The formulas are typed into a computerized system, the ingredients are carefully weighed on individual, high-precision scales, transported by a combination of pneumatic and closed carrier systems that ensure efficiency and security throughout the process.

One of the highlights is the mixer, where all the ingredients are blended, a unique piece of equipment in the Brazilian market, imported from Italy and used in the production of cookies for humans. The closed carrier system which transports the ingredients isolates the raw materials and prevents contact with the environment, thereby improving food safety. And the multiple phase system ensures that each ingredient reaches the mixer in the exact order and moment it needs to be added to the mix.

Once the mix is ready, it goes to the molding process – and not lamination, as occurs in the production of most snacks in Brazil. This process guarantees more precision for perfect cuts and shapes that are well-formed, not wasteful, and with the adequate product texture. In the next phase, the cookie goes straight into the oven to be baked – and not extruded, which represents another unique PremieRpet® feature. It’s about using the same process adopted when making cookies for humans, which provides more palatability (flavor) and makes the cookies bake in an absolutely uniform manner.

The cookies are placed into special 250g packages, with our Easy Open System, that helps consumers open it with ease, and the Open/Close System, a zipper function that allows for more conservation of flavor, aroma and crunchiness. And there you go! The market has just received a unique, innovative product.

This production process ensures exclusive, nutritious cookies with very high quality ingredients, baked and molded into unique and exclusive formats akin to the human standard of care and quality.


Since its foundation, PremieRpet® has had its actions directed towards sustainability, and this new factory couldn’t be any different. We even went further and spared no effort to make sure that the unit is 100% aligned with our values, incorporating a socio-environmental dimension from the ground up, becoming a renowned, pioneering example in the segment.


The project had expert labor and consultancy, which were completely directed towards a sustainable building and operations. The result deserves to be celebrated: the cookie factory has already started operating under a LEED Certification – Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design, considered the main seal for green buildings in Brazil and used in 143 countries.

A factory with a LEED New Construction Certification is the guarantee of a high-performance, sustainable building with international recognition. This achievement reflects the values that have long been present at PremieRpet® from the environmental point of view, and also from the social aspect, making it clear that the company is very conscientious of its employees’ health and safety, as well as the satisfaction and well-being of the consumers of the products made in the factory.


In order to get the LEED New Construction Certification, the factory went through a rigorous evaluation that considered seven issues: sustainable terrain, rational use of water, energy and atmosphere, materials and resources, indoor environmental quality, project innovation, and attention to the regional priorities of suppliers. It was a great challenge, so much so that no other factory in our segment has gained this certification in Brazil. But with great effort we were able to fulfill the requisites and we can celebrate this pioneering achievement.

Among the investments is the construction of two lakes for the collection of rainwater. Part of the water collected is for sanitation and part for irrigation, promoting control of the quantity and quality of the water returned to the environment. The installation of a roof with an area for water collection and flow restriction (washbasins, taps and urinals) also had an impact on the results, and all the initiatives put together generated over 20% economy in the total consumption of water and 50% in the use of fresh water for landscaping. The industrial process doesn’t generate effluents and the little water that is used cleaning the lines is treated in a private treatment center. We’ve achieved an exemplary hydric balance and generate excellent savings.

Our efforts were also targeted at energy efficiency, which is monitored daily. We had already been using thermal energy from boilers powered by wood chips, leftovers from the eucalyptus trees planted on our own farm, thereby closing the zero carbon emission cycle. The electrical energy, as per contract with the supplier, was already a product of 100% renewable sources, from small hydroelectric centers and windfarms. In the new factory, the materials were chosen carefully to promote even more efficiency. Glass, LED lights, translucid shingles, among others. The exchange of flourescent lightbulbs for LED lights alone generated savings of 10% of the total consumption. Even private transportation for employees was upgraded and a bicycle rack/shed was created to contribute to the reduction of car use and the CO2 emissions in the region.

Our construction prioritized materials and resources of low environmental impact, as well as residue management from the construction site, which were sent not to landfills, but to recyling centers with a goal of 75%. We adopted 10% of recycled content such as concrete, steel and aluminum, and 20% of material acquired by regional suppliers, favoring the development of the regional economy and saving on transportation and CO2 emissions.

On the issue of indoor environmental quality, materials with low emissions of volatile organic components (such as paint, stickers, coating and sealers from Eucatex), air flow, ventilation and smoke monitoring, thermal comfort with lighting control according to environment and work post were prioritized. We promoted natural light in 75% of the space and 90% of the occupied areas have a line of sight and access to the landscape.

After 2 years of investments we are proud to have achieved the LEED New Construction seal for the new factory operations and to have started the production on the new line of PremieR Cookies. They are unique products, from the conceptualization to all the stages of manufacturing. The result couldn’t have been any different: another success case by PremieRpet® and an innovation in the snack segment.

Premium Or Super Premium

All foods will feed animals, but not all help to maintain health, quality of life and beauty because they don’t have the same properties. What changes in these categories?

  • Comparative Chart
  • Premium foods in Brazil


Premium/Premium Special

Super Premium

Origin The 70's decade The 80's decade The 90's decade (PremieRpet® was the Pioneer producing in Brazil)
Minimal More complete and balanced formulas with nutritional levels above the recommended minimum More complete, concentrated formulas with optimal nutritional levels
Ingredients Low cost and low quality ingredients Good quality nutritional raw materials Maximum quality raw materials and special ingredients that promote extra health benefits
Formula Variable Non-variable Non-variable
Consumption, absorption and volume of stools High consumption, low absorption and poorly-formed stools in large amounts Intermediate consumption, good absorption and smaller, firm, easy-to-pick up stools Smaller consumption between the categories, maximum absorption and smaller, firm, easy-to-pick up stools
Focus Low cost Cost-benefit Promotes health, longevity and quality of life

Inoxihp S.r.l.
Since 1977, INOXIHP has been designing and manufacturing systems and components for high pressure water, mainly in the steel and mining industry.
We supply turn-key descaling systems (direct or hydro-pneumatic), plunger pumps,  hydraulic controls and valve manifolds for water driven press control, and pumping groups and valves for roof supports in coal mining longwalls.
The long lasting collaboration with leading engineering companies and OEMs is one of our strenghts and enabled us to have a wide range of products installed all over the world.

What We Do

The core business of the company is the production of oil, exploiting and optimizing precious future reserves, which is our key contribution to the socio-economic development of the country.

Daleel Petroleum extracts hydrocarbons from Block 5 located in Al Dhahira Region. The concession is governed by a Petroleum Agreement with the Government of the Sultanate of Oman, represented by the Ministry of Oil and Gas.

When Daleel took over Block 5 in 2002 it was producing about 4,500 barrels per day (bpd). We used a different approach with horizontal water-flooding technology and gradually managed to increase our production up to almost 41.000 bpd on average in 2013. By 2015 our target is to achieve production of 50,000 barrels per day.

Daleel Petroleum is one of the leading oil producers in Oman. It is a growing company that has built a very good foundation of ever more efficient production, use of latest technology, ethical business and social responsibility. The company has a talented and loyal workforce, a roster of excellent contractors and a burning ambition to succeed. Our vision is for the long term development of Daleel and create value for Oman.

Our operation of the concession has been a very successful project. There are many reasons behind such impressive results, but the number one is patience. Daleel is very patient when it comes to investing time, capital, and human resources.
